name: RDRPOSTagger
short_description:
RDRPOSTagger is a robust, easy-to-use and language-independent rule-based toolkit for the POS and morphological tagging. 
For the English POS tagging, RDRPOSTagger took 40 minutes to be trained on the Penn WSJ sections 0-18; and it then obtained a tagging accuracy of 96.51% on the Penn WSJ sections 22-24 with a tagging speed of 92K words per second, using a computer of Core2Duo 2.4GHz & 3GB of memory. For the Vietnamese POS tagging, RDRPOSTagger has reached an up-to-date highest tagging accuracy on the Vietnamese Treebank corpus  and also achieved 1st place at the VLSP 2013 POS tagging task. 
In addition to English and Vietnamese, RDRPOSTagger now supports the pre-trained POS and morphological tagging models to 13 languages including Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, French, German, Hindi, Italian, Lao, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish and Thai.
summary: A Rule-based Part-of-Speech and Morphological Tagging Toolkit
